mapper.insert: insert into routecategory(noroutecate, catename, userid) values(a_sq.nextval, #{catename}, #{userid})
insert into routecategory(noroutecate, catename, userid) values(a_sq.nextval, '내 코스', #{param1})
mapper.select: select noroutecate, catename from routecategory where userid = #{param1} order by noroutecate asc
